Text: The drone is planned to fly from here to Seattle to deliver the requested goods. It should try to avoid as many stops as possible to limit the transit time and fuel consumed.
Next week, we expect to see clear skies and low wind speeds, but with some higher temperatures. This weather should be suitable for any aircraft traveling during the day.
A wildfire has been detected along the mountain range. There is a no-fly-zone established for safety and nearby response vehicles are requested for fire control
A few hundred vehicles are expected to pass through this waypoint throughout the day. Extra fuel should be ordered for the increase in traffic through this station.
Several vehicles are in close proximity to each other and should coordinate priorities and movements to ensure safe operation.
